posts.content:
There will be one VIP camping pass for two adults and accommodation in a luxury bell tent.

There will be one VIP pass for two adults and bell tent accommodation fully furnished with beds,duvets,pillows ,wine ,beer and private toilet and shower in an enclosed VIP only tent area. It will be auctioned next week on ebay in aid of " Make a wish foundation " . Every penny from the sale will go to the charity.
The area will consist of just four luxury bell tents, so perfect for that special weekend.
you can park your bus right next to the tent ,and it's even got electricity and lights.
Could solve your problem if the wife wants a bit of a glamping time.
The tent does sleep four but can only consist of two adults and one or two children, there are two double beds , but one can be removed if not required.

Watch out for the auction next week if u are interested.
And good luck.
A
Is there a link to the auction ??
